displayName: Ensure No Public Database Links Exist
rationale: Using public database links in the database can allow anyone with a connection to the database to query, update, insert, delete data on a remote database depending on the userid that is part of the link.
recommended_action:
To remediate this setting, execute the following SQL statement, keeping in mind if this is granted in both container and pluggable database, you must connect to both places to revoke.
```
DROP PUBLIC DATABASE LINK <DB_LINK>;
```
error_message: One or more public database links exist
ruleNames: Ensure No Public Database Links Exist
